body_html:
Thanks for updating the PR. I left review comments.

Please do evaluate pandas_input_fn, it is significantly easier, and should be easy to adapt into a new function dict_input_fn or similar which does exactly what you want. We'd love to have that function if you end up writing it.

We will eventually remove DataFeeder for the betterment of the word, so relying on this functionality will be brittle.

body:
Thanks for updating the PR. I left review comments. 

Please do evaluate pandas_input_fn, it is significantly easier, and should be easy to adapt into a new function dict_input_fn or similar which does exactly what you want. We'd love to have that function if you end up writing it.

We will eventually remove DataFeeder for the betterment of the word, so relying on this functionality will be brittle.
